attributes.action: All food outlets to show what dishes contain any halal food clearly on its menu.
attributes.additional_details: When having a Sunday dinner in a restaurant or pub or cafe, you have no idea if the beef or chicken is halal thereby not giving the paying public the choice to eat halal or not. Obviously this applies to all meals served in the food establishment.
attributes.background: At the moment food from food outlets don't inform you that there could be halal products in your meal. Any meal should clearly state what if anything in your meal is halal.
